Per day: per day Per year: Reset your whole progress Are you sure ? YES NO OK Can't connect to web service NO INTERNET CONNECTION! ERROR 404 Tap to start a challenge! Life regained: hours WELCOME TO QUIT HABIT! BEAT YOUR MILESTONE %d DAYS! It's ok to fail! Don't waste your life! All you need is a little patience and persistence. Awesome! We will start tutorial now. Tap to see your progress for your challenge! Our strength grows out of our weakness
	 - Ralph Waldo Emerson Believe in your potential, and you will be successful
	 - John Maxwell Believe you can and you're halfway there
	 - Theodore Roosevelt The surest way not to fail is to determine to succeed
	 - Richard Brinsley Sheridan The secret of getting ahead is getting started
	 - Mark Twain Android Developer | Software Developer | Java Enthusiast It is in your moments of decision that your destiny is shaped
	 - Tony Robbins Hello, this is your first day! Since you're here it means that you made the first step in order to get rid of your habit Did you abstained to smoke in the last days ? Did you abstained to smoke today ?
Quit Habit! App is a motivational app that tracks your daily struggle to stop your habit. 
 
This app also tracks daily saved amount of money and have daily motivational quotes. 
 
I have to mention a special list of authors from which i borrowed design from: 
-app icon made by @Roundicons from www.flaticon.com; 
-savings icon made by @Eucalyp from www.flaticon.com; 
-rank icons made by @Dimitry Miroliubov/Smashicons from www.flaticon.com; 
-card icons made by @icongeek26 from www.flaticon.com; 
-counter icon made by @starline from www.flaticon.com but made some modifications by myself. 
 
As you can see, i did not added any advertising campaign because, i, myself, dislike ads. 
If you enjoyed this app, please support it by sharing it with friends or other people. 

 Thank you!"
